title: Gandalf Begin
body:
Frodo! I'm glad you're here. I need you to take this ring to Mordor and destroy it for me, ok? (Select an option)

[[Okay]]
[[No]]
[[Why?]]

title: No
body:
Y--You don't--what??
You Bagginses are supposed to crave adventure. What's gotten into you, boy?

[[I don't feel like it]]

title: Why?
body:
The Evil Lord Sauron will use it to gain umlimited power.

[[What if I just kill Sauron?]]

title: What if I just kill Sauron?
body:
Kill Sauro -- what?? You can't just kill Sauron, Frodo. He's not exactly... mortal.

[[Yes I can]]

title: Yes I can
body:
I had no idea you were so aggressive, Master Frodo. Please just take the ring to Mordor and destroy it.

[[Fine]]

title: Fine
body:
But... if you do happen to see Sauron there... it might help to have this...

[[Next|acquireFlameThrower]]

title: acquireFlameThrower
body:
(You acquire a flame thrower)
<<player.hasFlamethrower = true>>
[[Score!]]

title: I don't feel like it
body:
Wha-well I never--
...Listen, Master Frodo. The fate of Middle Earth is at stake here. If this ring isn't destroyed, there may be no shire to laze around in.

[[What's in it for me?]]

title: What's in it for me?
body:
What? Have you listened to nothing I've said??

[[I want a cut of the profits]]

title: I want a cut of the profits
body:
I... OK. In exchange for taking this ring to Mordor, Frodo, I will give you this. It will aid you in your journey.

[[Next|acquireFlameThrower]]

title: Okay
body:
It will be a perilous Journey, Master Frodo. To protect yourself, it will help to have this...

[[Next|acquireFlameThrower]]

title: Gandalf Burned
body:
Please be careful where you point that thing.

[[I'll consider it]]

title: Sam beforeGandalf
body:
Mr Frodo! Good to see you. Excellent morning for tending to the garden, isn't it? (Select an option)

[[You're not even tending a garden, Sam]]
[[Leave]]

title: You're not even tending a garden, Sam
body:
Well... I was going to get around to it...

[[I don't believe you]]

title: I don't believe you
body:
I... why don't you go talk to Gandalf and leave me alone?

[[Leave]]

title: Sam beforeGandalf2
body:
Go talk to Gandalf and quit buggin' me, Mr Frodo.

[[Leave]]

title: Sam afterGandalf
body:
What were you chattin' about with Gandalf, Mr Frodo?

[[So is this an alternate timeline where you weren't droppin no eaves?]]
[[Leave]]

title: So is this an alternate timeline where you weren't droppin no eaves?
body:
What?

[[Nevermind]]

title: Nevermind
body:
Alrighty then...

[[I'm going on a perilous journey, Sam. Do you want to join me?]]

title: I'm going on a perilous journey, Sam. Do you want to join me?
body:
Perilous, you say? Perilous isn't really my style. Gotta give a hard pass on that one.

[[We're not friends anymore.]]

title: Sam Burned
body:
Mr Frodo, I don't generally like having such things pointed at me.

[[I don't care]]

title: Sauron
body:
So, it comes down to this! Just you and me, Frodo. The victor of this glorious battle shall change the fate of Middle Earth forever!

[[I don't remember the story going like this]]

title: I don't remember the story going like this
body:
Come on, show me your worst!

[[OK]]

title: win
body:
Congratulations! You have defeated Sauron! You win!
<<soundVictory.play(); soundMusic.pause()>>

[[Well alright then.]]
[[Wait, what about the ring?]]

title: Wait, what about the ring?
body:
You can keep the ring as a souvenir.

[[Well alright then.]]

title: Gandalf After
body:
Head over to the right to begin your journey, young Hobbit.

[[Leave]]

title: Score!
body:
Hold space or use two fingers to activate the flamethrower.

[[Got it]]

title: Got it
body:
Now be off, young hobbit! Many adventures await you to the East! Well, approximately two, anyway.

[[Leave]]

title: Well alright then.
body:
Feel free to explore and burn more things.
<<soundMusic.play()>>

[[OK]]
